MessageTypes.label: Perform lamp test
MessageTypes.description: $ will be time in ms for the test, e.g. 1000 is 1 sec

MessageTypes.label: Set B1 prompt
MessageTypes.description: Possible values are: HDG, AP, NAV, ROL, APR, REV, CLR

MessageTypes.label: Set B2 prompt
MessageTypes.description: Possible values are: ALT, PFT, VS, GS, CLR

MessageTypes.label: Set B3 prompt
MessageTypes.description: Possible values are: REV, NAV, APR, GS, CLR

MessageTypes.label: Set B4 prompt
MessageTypes.description: Possible values are: REV, NAV, APR, GS, CLR

MessageTypes.label: Set Annunciator ON
MessageTypes.description: Possible values are: AP, YD, L_ARM, R_ARM, DOWN, PT, UP, ALERT, FPM, FT, HPA, INHG

MessageTypes.label: Set Annunciator OFF
MessageTypes.description: Possible values are: AP, YD, L_ARM, R_ARM, DOWN, PT, UP, ALERT, FPM, FT, HPA, INHG
